lines.text: create int array book of size 6
create int array str of size 6 with array of size 10 containing { " Power " , " Time " , " Space " , " Soul " , " Reality " , " Mind " }
lines.code: char str [ 6 ] [ 10 ] = { " Power " , " Time " , " Space " , " Soul " , " Reality " , " Mind " } ;

lines.text: if str is equal to " purple " , set book [ 0 ] to 1
if str is equal to " green " , set book [ 1 ] to 1
if str equals " blue " , set book [ 2 ] to 1
if str is " orange " , set book [ 3 ] to 1
if str is equals to " red " , set book [ 4 ] to 1
if str equals " yellow " , set book [ 5 ] to 1
if book [ i ] is falsy , print str [ i ]
lines.code: if ( ! book [ i ] ) cout << str [ i ] << endl ;
